div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1836 Pachkura Buzurg, Hamirpur district, c. 70 km. S of Cawnpur, Uttar Pradesh, India, 1877 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 98+ AR Eucratides I: 3 dr. Menander: 9 tetradr.; 31 dr. Apollodotus I: 34 dr. Antimachus II: 21 dr. Disposition: Paris 2 Smith, Indian Ant. 1904, pp. 217-8
